Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Amoxicillin-clavulanate (0.25/0.12-32/16 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with amoxicillin-clavulanate for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-positive organisms.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus and Enterococcus) isolates from pure culture using Phoenix panels containing amoxicillin-clavulanate.
